participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and adventurous, loves to explore new places and experience different cultures.
participant_1.background: My most interesting experience was meeting one of my favorite celebrities and getting his autograph when I was growing up in New Hampshire. My husband is a soldier in the us army. I have a beard that is longer. My dad got a job transfer so we moved to a new town. I hope to visit Quebec, Canada someday.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: easygoing and humorous, enjoys spending time with family and has a laid-back approach to life.
participant_2.background: I'm a thrifty hockey fan who is trying to learn Swedish. I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat. My favorite store is American Eagle. I enjoy taking late night walks when it's completely dark. I try to take a walk outside to clear my head.

content.text: Pretty good. I just found out I'm going to Quebec, Canada next month!
Oh nice! I'm from Canada, so I'm partial to Quebec.
What's your favorite part about the country?
I love the food, the culture, and the people.
I've heard good things about the food. Do you have any recommendations for places to eat?
Oh sure! I love La Banquise, Au Pied de Cochon, and Le Bilboquet.
Those all sound delicious! I'll definitely have to check them out.
Awesome! I'm sure you'll love them.
Me too! Thanks for the suggestions.
No problem! Have a great time in Quebec!
